text: Janakpur is a sub-metropolitan in Dhanusa District of Nepal. Janakpur may also refer to: * Janakpur Airport, airport in Janakpur, Nepal * Janakpur Road, town in Sitamarhi district, Bihar, India * Janakpur Zone, former zone of Nepal * Janakpur Road railway station, railway station in Sitamarhi district, Bihar, India * Janakpur Today (daily), Nepali language national daily newspaper, published from Janakpurdham == See also == * Janakpuri (disambiguation)
title: Janakpur (disambiguation)
